title: Ability To Get In Game Lore

comments.author: cyhadam.3082
comments.body:
Hi all,

I wanted to see if there has been any developments made on allowing the first couple of lines of /wiki search to be shown in-game. I think this would help players experience more of the lore of the game but not break the immersion, forcing them to leave the game and read a wiki page. Any thoughts?
